total.sales_transaction_information_2 total_sales_transaction_information_2, total.sales_transaction_information_3 total_sales_transaction_information_3 FROM t_sales_error_sales_order_information as root LEFT OUTER JOIN t_sales_error_sales_transaction_header tran ON root.transaction_id = tran.transaction_id LEFT OUTER JOIN t_sales_error_sales_transaction_detail item ON tran.transaction_id = item.transaction_id AND tran.order_sub_number = item.order_sub_number AND tran.sales_transaction_id = item.sales_transaction_id AND item.product_classification = 'ITEM' LEFT OUTER JOIN t_sales_error_sales_transaction_detail subnitem ON item.transaction_id = subnitem.transaction_id AND item.order_sub_number = subnitem.order_sub_number AND item.sales_transaction_id = subnitem.sales_transaction_id AND item.item_detail_sub_number = subnitem.item_detail_sub_number AND subnitem.product_classification = 'NMITEM' LEFT OUTER JOIN t_sales_error_sales_transaction_detail_info subniteminfo ON subnitem.transaction_id = subniteminfo.transaction_id AND subnitem.order_sub_number = subniteminfo.order_sub_number AND subnitem.sales_transaction_id = subniteminfo.sales_transaction_id AND subnitem.detail_sub_number = subniteminfo.detail_sub_number LEFT OUTER JOIN t_sales_error_sales_transaction_discount subnitemdiscount ON subnitem.transaction_id = subnitemdiscount.transaction_id AND subnitem.order_sub_number = subnitemdiscount.order_sub_number AND subnitem.sales_transaction_id = subnitemdiscount.sales_transaction_id AND subnitem.detail_sub_number = subnitemdiscount.detail_sub_number LEFT OUTER JOIN t_sales_error_sales_transaction_tax subnitemtax ON subnitem.transaction_id = subnitemtax.transaction_id AND subnitem.order_sub_number = subnitemtax.order_sub_number AND subnitem.sales_transaction_id = subnitemtax.sales_transaction_id AND subnitem.detail_sub_number = subnitemtax.detail_sub_number LEFT OUTER JOIN t_sales_error_sales_transaction_discount itemdiscount ON item.transaction_id = itemdiscount.transaction_id AND item.order_sub_number = itemdiscount.order_sub_number AND item.sales_transaction_id = itemdiscount.sales_transaction_id AND item.detail_sub_number = itemdiscount.detail_sub_number LEFT OUTER JOIN t_sales_error_sales_transaction_tax itemtax ON item.transaction_id = itemtax.transaction_id AND item.order_sub_number = itemtax.order_sub_number AND item.sales_transaction_id = itemtax.sales_transaction_id AND item.detail_sub_number = itemtax.detail_sub_number LEFT OUTER JOIN t_sales_error_sales_transaction_detail nitem ON tran.transaction_id = nitem.transaction_id AND tran.order_sub_number = nitem.order_sub_number AND tran.sales_transaction_id = nitem.sales_transaction_id AND nitem.product_classification = 'NMITEM' LEFT OUTER JOIN t_sales_error_sales_transaction_detail_info niteminfo ON nitem.transaction_id = niteminfo.transaction_id AND nitem.order_sub_number = niteminfo.order_sub_number AND nitem.sales_transaction_id = niteminfo.sales_transaction_id AND nitem.detail_sub_number = niteminfo.detail_sub_number LEFT OUTER JOIN t_sales_error_sales_transaction_discount nitemdiscount ON nitem.transaction_id = nitemdiscount.transaction_id AND nitem.order_sub_number = nitemdiscount.order_sub_number AND nitem.sales_transaction_id = nitemdiscount.sales_transaction_id AND nitem.detail_sub_number = nitemdiscount.detail_sub_number LEFT OUTER JOIN t_sales_error_sales_transaction_tax nitemtax ON nitem.transaction_id = nitemtax.transaction_id AND nitem.order_sub_number = nitemtax.order_sub_number AND nitem.sales_transaction_id = nitemtax.sales_transaction_id AND nitem.detail_sub_number = nitemtax.detail_sub_number LEFT OUTER JOIN t_sales_error_sales_transaction_tender tender ON tran.transaction_id = tender.transaction_id AND tran.order_sub_number = tender.order_sub_number AND tran.sales_transaction_id = tender.sales_transaction_id LEFT OUTER JOIN t_sales_error_sales_transaction_tender_info tenderinfo ON tender.transaction_id = tenderinfo.transaction_id AND tender.order_sub_number = tenderinfo.order_sub_number AND tender.sales_transaction_id = tenderinfo.sales_transaction_id AND tender.tender_group = tenderinfo.tender_group AND tender.tender_id = tenderinfo.tender_id AND tender.tender_sub_number = tenderinfo.tender_sub_number LEFT OUTER JOIN t_sales_error_sales_transaction_tax tax ON tran.transaction_id = tax.transaction_id AND tran.order_sub_number = tax.order_sub_number AND tran.sales_transaction_id = tax.sales_transaction_id AND tax.detail_sub_number = 0 LEFT OUTER JOIN t_sales_error_sales_transaction_total_amount total ON tran.transaction_id = total.transaction_id AND tran.order_sub_number = total.order_sub_number AND tran.sales_transaction_id = total.sales_transaction_id WHERE root.transaction_id = #{salesTransactionId}
